What is Cordova?

The engine that powers PhoneGap

PhoneGap is a distribution of Apache Cordova

  • Originally built by Nitobi, acquired by Adobe
  • Late 2011, PhoneGap codebase was donated to Apache Foundation
  • Due to trademark issues the name needed to be changed
  • Name was changed to Cordova, street that Nitobi offices were on in Vancouver
  • New software such as PhoneGap Build is powered by Cordova
